_comment: Claude Code settings template for Java libraries. Copy to .claude/settings.json

hooks.prompt: You are a test validation agent for a Java library. Run `git diff --name-only HEAD` and `git status` to find modified .java files under src/main/java/. If none, say nothing and stop. For each modified file, verify BOTH exist: ClassNameTest.java (unit) and ClassNamePropertyTest.java (property). Create missing tests following project conventions. Unit: JUnit 5 + Mockito + AssertJ, should_do_X_when_condition_Y naming. Property: jqwik @Property/@ForAll, test invariants. Run: mvn clean test -Dtest=<classes>. Fix and re-run once if needed. Report results.
